slides.title: Welcome to Arttic Fox
description: We are a Digital Shop that is trying to help small businesses and start-ups. We are specialize on Web Design and Development, as well as Application Design. Our studio cares for User Experience of the websites and applications we design.

slides.title: Istanbul Cafe
description: Istanbul cafe is located at heart of Yonge and Eglington. It is one of the best Turkish Coffee in Toronto.
We needed to create a web presence for them. This simple Wordpress website displayed the essence of the brand and the taste of the Turkish culture.

slides.title: Noble Networks
description: Noble Networks is an IT Firm located in Toronto. They are a partner of ours and we created their website. They help out their clients like us in any way they can.
We are currently working on their new website.

slides.title: Silver Comet Auto
description: Silver Comet Auto, came to us a few years ago and they were just launching their brand. They are a strong competitor in Mississauga area as a second-hand car dealer.
We created a brand strategy as well as Logo and all the print pieces. We Also built a website with WordPress for them. Since they had unique requirements, we had to come up with a different solution.

slides.title: Search Engine Films
description: Search Engine Films is a well-established film distributor and production company based in Toronto. Since they needed to change the content and information on the site frequently, we provided a user-friendly and clean client facing back-end.

slides.title: Abbolita Films
description: When we had a chance to help Abbolita Films, they had a really short deadline because of the festivals. In a really short period of time, we could build a really nice website.
